references.paper_title: Partial policy-based reinforcement learning for anatomical landmark localization in 3d medical images
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the reinforcement learning component of the proposed method, framing object detection as a Markov Decision Process.

references.paper_title: Mixmatch: A holistic approach to semi-supervised learning
references.reason: This work provides a key semi-supervised learning technique that is adapted for the sparsely annotated scenario in aerial images.

references.paper_title: Active object localization with deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper details applying reinforcement learning to object detection, informing the adaptive exploration strategy proposed in the new method.
This paper introduces conformal prediction, a key component of the PECL framework for quantifying uncertainty and handling imbalanced data.

references.paper_title: Policy gradient methods for reinforcement learning with function approximation
references.reason: This paper is fundamental to reinforcement learning, the core of the adaptive pseudo-label exploration policy in the proposed method.
